SA07n933:7: jagāma duḥkhena vigāhamāno jalāgame strota ivāpagāyāḥ ||3 ||
SA07n933:8: atho mahadbhiḥ pati saṃpatadbhiḥ saṃpūjyamānāya tathāgatāya |
SA07n933:9: karttuṃ praṇāmaṃ na śaśāka nandastenābhireme tu gurormahimnā ||4 ||
SA07n933:10: svaṃ cāvasaṅgaṃ pathi nirmumukṣurbhaktiṃ janasyānyamateśva rakṣan |
SA07n933:11: nandaṃ ca gehābhimukhaṃ jighṛkṣan mārgaṃ tato'nyaṃ sugataḥ prapede ||5 ||
SA07n933:12: tato viviktaṃ ca viviktacetāḥ sanmārgavin mārgamabhipratasthe |
SA07n933:18: tatsādhu sāhupriya mattpriyārtham tatrāstu bhikṣūttama bhaikṣakālaḥ |
SA07n933:19: asau hi madhyaṃ nabhaso yiyāsuḥ kālaṃ pratismārayatīva sūryaḥ ||9 ||
SA07n933:21: tādṛṅ nimittaṃ sugataścakāra nāhārakṛtyaṃ sa yathā viveda ||10 ||
SA07n933:22: tataḥ sa kṛtvā munaye praṇāmaṃ gṛhaprayāṇāya matiṃ cakāra |
SA07n933:23: anugrahārthaṃ sugatastu tasmai pātraṃ dadau puraṣkarapatranetraḥ ||11 ||
SA07n933:24: tataḥ sa loke dadataḥ phalārthaṃ pātrasya tasyāpratimasya pātram |
SA07n933:28: bhāryānurāgeṇa yadā gṛhaṃ sa pātraṃ gṛhītvā'pi yiyāsureva |
SA07n933:30: nirmokṣabījaṃ hi dadarśa tasya jñānaṃ mṛdu kleśarajaśca tīvram |
SA07n933:31: kleśānukūlaṃ viṣayātmakaṃ ca nandaṃ yatastaṃ munirācakarṣa ||15 ||
SA07n933:36: nandaḥ sa ca pratyayaneyacetā yaṃ śiśriye tanmayatāmavāpa |
SA07n933:37: yasmādimaṃ tatra cakāra yannaṃ taṃ snehapaṅkān munirujjihīrṣan ||18 ||
SA07n933:43: kareṇa cakrāṅkatalena mūrdhni pasparśa caivedamuvāca cainam ||21 ||
SA07n933:44: yāvanna hiṃsraḥ samupaiti kālaḥ śamāya tāvat kuru saumya buddhim |
SA07n933:47: havyairivāgneḥ pavaneritasya lokasya kāmairna hi tṛptirasti ||23 ||
SA07n933:50: hitasya vaktā pravaraḥ suhṛdbhyo dharmāya khedo guṇavān śramebhyaḥ |
SA07n933:51: jñānāya kṛtyaṃ paramaṃ kriyābhyaḥ kimindriyāṇāmupagamya dāsyam ||25 ||
SA07n933:54: jarāsamā nāstyamṛjā prajānāṃ vyādheḥ samo nāsti jagatyanarthaḥ |
SA07n933:55: mṛtyoḥ samaṃ nāsti bhayaṃ pṛthivyāmetattrayaṃ khalvavaśena sevyam ||27 ||
SA07n933:56: snehena kaścinna samo'sti pāśaḥ sroto na tṛṣṇāsamamasti hāri |
SA07n933:57: rāgāgninā nāsti samastathāgnistaccet trayaṃ nāsti sukhaṃ ca te'sti ||28 ||
SA07n933:60: prajñāmayaṃ varma badhāna tasmānno kṣāntinighnasya hi śokabāṇāḥ |
SA07n933:62: yathauṣadhairhastagataiḥ savidyo na daśyate kaścana pannagena |
SA07n933:64: āsthāya yogaṃ parigamya tattvaṃ na trāsamāgacchati mṛtyukāle |
SA07n933:65: ābaddhavarmā sudhanuḥ kṛtāsro jigīṣayā śūra ivāhavasthaḥ ||32 ||
SA07n933:67: dhṛṣṭaṃ girāntarhṛdayena sīdaṃstatheti nandaḥ sugataṃ babhāṣe ||33 ||
SA07n933:68: atha pramādācca tamujjihīrṣan matvāgamasyaiva ca pātrabhūtam |
SA07n933:72: śrutvātha nandasya manīṣitaṃ tad buddhāya vaidehamuniḥ śaśaṃsa |
SA07n933:73: saṃśrutya tasmādapi tasya bhāvaṃ mahāmunirnandamuvāca bhūyaḥ ||36 ||
SA07n933:75: jñātīṃśca dṛṣṭvā vratino gṛhasthān saṃvinna kiṃ te'sti na vāsti cetaḥ ||37 ||
SA07n933:76: rājarṣayaste viditā na nūnaṃ vanāni ye śiśriyire hasantaḥ |
SA07n933:77: niṣṭhīvya kāmānupaśāntikāmāḥ kāmeṣu naivaṃ kṛpaṇeṣu saktāḥ ||38 ||
SA07n933:78: bhūyaḥ samālokya gṛheṣu doṣān niśāmya tattyāgakṛtaṃ ca śarma |
SA07n933:79: naivāsti moktuṃ matirālayaṃ te deśaṃ mumūrṣoriva sopasargam ||39 ||
SA07n933:80: saṃsārakāntāraparāyaṇasya śive kathaṃ te pathi nārurukṣā |
SA07n933:81: āropyamāṇasya tameva mārgaṃ bhraṣṭasya sārthādiva sārthikasya ||40 ||
SA07n933:82: yaḥ sarvato veśmani dahyamāne śayīta mohānna tato vyapeyāt |
SA07n933:83: kālāgninā vyādhijarāśikhena loke pradīpte sa bhavet pramattaḥ ||41 ||
SA07n933:84: praṇīyamānaśca yathā vadhāya matto hasecca pralapecca vadhyaḥ |
SA07n933:85: mṛtyau tathā tiṣṭhati pāśahaste śocyaḥ pramādyan viparitacetāḥ ||42 ||
SA07n933:86: yadā narendrāśca kuṭumbinaśca vihāya bandhūṃśca parigrahāṃśca |
SA07n933:87: yayuśca yāsyanti ca yānti caiva priyeṣvanityeṣu kuto'nurodhaḥ ||43 ||
SA07n933:88: kiñcinna paśyāmi ratasya yatra tadanyabhāvena bhavenna duḥkham |
SA07n933:89: tasmāt kvacinna kṣamate prasaktiryadi kṣamastadvigamānna śokaḥ ||44 ||
SA07n933:90: tatsaumya lolaṃ parigamya lokaṃ māyopamaṃ citramivendrajālam |
SA07n933:91: priyābhidhānaṃ tyaja mohajālaṃ chettuṃ matiste yadi duḥkhajālam ||45 ||
SA07n933:92: varaṃ hitodarkamāniṣṭamannaṃ na svādu yat syādahitānubaddham |
SA07n933:93: yasmādahaṃ tvāṃ viniyojayāmi śive śucau vartmani vipriye'pi ||46 ||
SA07n933:95: tathojjihīrṣuḥ khalu rāgaśalyaṃ tattvāmavocaṃ paruṣaṃ hitāya ||47 ||
SA07n933:99: yāvadvayo yogavidhau samarthaṃ buddhiṃ kuru śreyasi tāvadeva ||49 ||
SA07n933:100: ityevamuktaḥ sa vināyakena hitaiṣiṇā kāruṇikena nandaḥ |
SA07n933:101: kartāsmi sarvaṃ bhagavan vacaste tathā yathājñāpayasītyuvāca ||50 ||
SA07n933:104: atho nataṃ tasya mukhaṃ sabāṣpaṃ pravāsyamāneṣu śiroruheṣu |
SA07n933:107: pūrṇaḥ śaśī bahulapakṣagataḥ kṣapānte bālātapena pariṣikta ivāvabhāse ||53 ||
SA07n933:108: saundarananda kāvye “nanda-dīkṣā“ nāma pañcama sarga samāpta |
